description: This is the 3rd edition of this GPS-based trail map for hikers, mountaineers, backcountry skiers, mountain bikers and horseback riders. It includes access roads, tracks, trails and mountaineering routes. Areas covered include Spruce Lake Protected Area, Big Creek Provincial Park and the Mud Lakes with accurate positions for campgrounds, campsites, creek crossings and historic sites. Made of waterproof and tearproof material that stands up to use. Scale is 1:62,500 with a 1:30,000 map of the core Spruce Lake area on the reverse side.
name: Southern Chilcotin Mountains Trail Map 3rd Edition
